name: Fiction
description: Imaginative or made-up stories that are not based on real events.

name: Science Fiction
description: Speculative fiction that often involves futuristic technology, space exploration, and extraterrestrial life.

name: Mystery
description: Stories focused on solving a crime, often involving a detective or amateur sleuth.

name: Fantasy
description: Genre that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as primary elements of plot, theme, and/or setting.

name: Romance
description: Novels focused on romantic love relationships.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Fiction set in the past, often with historical events, figures, or settings.

name: Non-Fiction
description: Books based on real events, facts, and information.

name: Biography
description: An account of a person's life written by someone else.

name: Self-Help
description: Books focused on personal development and self-improvement.

name: Science
description: Books that explore scientific concepts and discoveries.
